A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Lots of plot holes if your a hard core fan.  Jokes were too many and not very funny for this type of film.  Luke is always 2 seconds away from crying\, his entire story is patchy and thrown together.  Chewie is not used well at all....I could go on.  SJW politics seems to find it's way into this film too\, and ruins the scenes it's in.  Just an average film.  Great CGI.  Thats it. Go for the explosions.
